messages.title: Jim works for Wapping
messages.content: I'm proud to have represented the area for 20 years, focusing on the issues and people who need help the most. I hope I can count on your support on Thursday 8 June to continue this hard work. This is a great place, but I don't want to see it damaged by cuts to our services or a Tory-driven 'Hard Brexit' that will wreck our economy. I am committed to our area and understand the concerns and aspirations of those who live here. Whether I am fighting for affordable homes or to keep our GP and hospital services open, the local area and its residents are at the heart of everything I do.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Stand up against a Hard Brexit and for a stronger economy
keyPolicies.policyDescription: I will fight for the best EU-deal to protect jobs and growth across the whole country and in our area.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Stand up for everyone in Poplar & Limehouse
keyPolicies.policyDescription: I'll support fighting for local people and help to create the new jobs we need.
I'll fight to keep our health services free and effective.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Stand up for affordable housing and sustainable development
keyPolicies.policyDescription: I will support renters and leaseholders, support the building of affordable homes and take measures to improve local housing conditions.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Stand up for our quality of life
keyPolicies.policyDescription: I will work for our schools, safer streets and cleaner air.

issues.brexitEurope: Stand up against a Hard Brexit
issues.economy: Stand up against a Hard Brexit and for a stronger economy
issues.education: Stand up for our quality of life
issues.labourEmployment: Stand up for everyone in Poplar & Limehouse
